SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bank
This class represents a bank object that manages a cash and armor balance.
Challenge
Creates a challenge for a hero.
Guild
The Guild class represents a guild of heroes.
GuildCommand
GuildCommand is a class that takes a single command as input, and provides methods to retrieve and parse the command arguments.
GuildCommandSystem
GuildCommandSystem is a class that takes a list of commands as input, and provides methods to retrieve and parse the commands one by one.
Hero
Hero is an abstract class representing a character in a game.
Hero0
A subclass of the Hero class that represents a hero of category 0.
Hero1
A subclass of the Hero class that represents a hero of category 1.
Hero2
A subclass of the Hero class that represents a hero of category 2.
Hero3
A subclass of the Hero class that represents a hero of category 3.
Hero4
A subclass of the Hero class that represents a hero of category 4.
Main
Main class for the TP1 project and entry point to the program.
Quest
